Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 93rd overall pick, by New York (A) in 1966...
Injured on 7/11/1966 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/27/1967 with a Stiff Elbow, out for one week...
Released by New York (A) on 2/13/1970...
Drafted in 6th round, 106th overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1973...
Drafted in 1st round, 19th overall pick, by New York (A) in 1976...
Traded from New York (A) to Los Angeles on 2/20/1976 (Going to LA: P D. Palmer. Going to NYY: LF T. Wilson)...
Injured on 4/3/1977 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/1/1977 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Injured on 6/20/1979 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Traded from Los Angeles to Baltimore on 4/1/1980 (Going to LA: P D. Tidrow. Going to BAL: P D. Palmer)...
Injured on 4/26/1983 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 5/29/1983 with a Broken Elbow, out for 9-10 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/20/1984...
Had first career hit on 5/9/1988, off Charlie Lea (BOS)...
Injured on 6/15/1988 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/15/1990 to a 3-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
